name: Fate Point Display
description: Automatically adds and updates token markers to track characters' FATE Point totals, and provides helper macros to increment, decrement, and reset those values.

useroptions.name: Use Macros
useroptions.description: Automatically create and maintain macros for this API.

useroptions.name: GM Only
useroptions.description: The commands and macros will only be visible and usable by players with GM permissions.

useroptions.name: Players Can Reset
useroptions.description: Players can use the reset and resetall commands. Overridden by [GM Only].

useroptions.name: Token Marker Name
useroptions.description: If not blank then the specified marker will be used to indicate the current fate point total on character-linked tokens. Supports custom markers. If multiple tokens with the same name exist, the first returned will be used.

useroptions.name: Fate Point Attribute Name
useroptions.description: The name of the attribute representing a character's current Fate Point total. Defaults to value used by Evil Hats' official Roll20 FATE Character Sheet (https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/tree/master/Fate).

useroptions.name: Refresh Attribute Name
useroptions.description: The name of the attribute representing a character's Refresh. Defaults to value used by Evil Hats' official Roll20 FATE Character Sheet (https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/tree/master/Fate).

useroptions.name: Disable Marker Display Attribute Name
useroptions.description: If set then Characters with this attribute set to '1' will not have token markers enabled. NOTE: this will remove markers of the designated type from tokens with this flag set.

useroptions.name: Enable Marker Display Attribute Name
useroptions.description: If set then only Characters with this attribute set to '1' will have token markers enabled. NOTE: this will remove markers of the designated type from tokens without this flag.
